page.title: 12INDOOR SPORTS FACILITIES
page.content:
The Bassetlaw Centre is open seven days a week including Bank Holidays. Its facilities include a snooker hall, bowls, athletics track, tennis courts and weight-training. There is also a bar and a snack bar. Day membership is available.
Worksop Sports Centre has a large sports hall and activity area. Its facilities include squash, badminton, football, trampolining, hockey and swimming in its two pools. There are also outdoor facilities at this centre including a 400 metre athletics track, three tennis courts and football, hockey and cricket pitches.
